properties.property:
SELECT B.KEY_ AS processKey, -- 流程KEY B.NAME_ AS processName, -- 流程名称 COUNT(1) AS processNum, -- 流程总数 (COUNT(A.END_TIME_) - COUNT(A.DELETE_REASON_)) AS passNum, -- 通过总数(结束流程-废弃总数) (COUNT(1) - COUNT(A.END_TIME_)) AS waitNum, -- 待审总数(所有流程-结束的流程) (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '1') AS rejectNum, -- 驳回总数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '2') AS cancelNum, -- 撤销总数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '3') AS discardNum -- 废弃总数 FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_
-- 业务类型 LEFT JOIN (SELECT WB.BUSINESS_NAME, WB.BUSINESS_ID, WPB.PROCESS_KEY FROM TD_WF_BUSINESSTYPE WB, TD_WF_PRO_BUSINESSTYPE WPB WHERE WB.BUSINESS_ID = WPB.BUSINESSTYPE_ID) C ON B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY
where 1=1
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end
#if($businessType && !$businessType.equals("")) AND C.BUSINESS_ID = #[businessType] #end
#if($app && !$app.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ IN (SELECT PROCDEF_ID FROM TD_WF_APP_PROC_RELATION R, TD_WF_APP A WHERE A.ID = R.WF_APP_ID AND (A.SYSTEM_ID LIKE #[app] OR A.SYSTEM_NAME LIKE #[app])) #end
GROUP BY B.KEY_, B.NAME_

SELECT A.BUSINESS_KEY_ as businessKey, -- 业务主题 A.START_USER_ID_ as startUserId, -- 流程发起人 a.start_time_ as startTime, -- 流程开启时间 A.END_TIME_ as endTime, -- 流程结束时间 A.DURATION_ as duration, -- 耗时 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO AA WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = AA.PROCESS_ID) as delegateNum, -- 转办次数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK AA WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = AA.PROCESS_ID) as entrustNum, -- 委托次数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM td_wf_deal_task AA WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = AA.PROCESS_ID) as discardNum, -- 废弃次数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM td_wf_deal_task AA WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = AA.PROCESS_ID) as cancelNum, -- 撤销次数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM td_wf_deal_task AA WHERE A.PROC_INST_ID_ = AA.PROCESS_ID) as rejectNum -- 驳回次数 FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_
WHERE 1 = 1
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT count(1) as PASSNUM, sum(A.DURATION_) as WORKTIME FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND A.DELETE_REASON_ IS NULL
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT COUNT(1) as DELEGATENUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE 1=1
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '1') AS rejectNum, -- 驳回总数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '2') AS cancelNum, -- 撤销总数 (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C where B.KEY_ = C.PROCESS_KEY and C.DEALTYPE = '3') AS discardNum -- 废弃总数 FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ WHERE 1=1
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT count(1) AS PersonlDealNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK E WHERE A.ID_ = E.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO F WHERE A.ID_ = F.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK G WHERE A.ID_ = G.TASKID)
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT COUNT(1) as NODENUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF B ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = B.ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_TASKINST C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROC_INST_ID_ WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND A.DELETE_REASON_ IS NULL
#if($processKey && !$processKey.equals("")) AND B.KEY_ = #[processKey] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

select t1.user_id as userId, t2.user_realname as realName, t2.user_name as userName from TD_SM_ORGUSER t1 left join TD_SM_USER t2 on t1.user_id = t2.user_id where 1=1
#if($orgId && !$orgId.equals("")) AND t1.org_id = #[orgId] #end
#if($realName && !$realName.equals("")) AND (t2.user_realname like #[realName] or t2.user_name like #[realName]) #end

SELECT count(*) as STARTNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST T WHERE 1=1
#if($userName && !$userName.equals("")) AND t.START_USER_ID_ = #[userName] #end
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

-- 通过任务数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A
WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK B WHERE A.ID_ = B.TASKID) AND A.ASSIGNEE_ = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end
UNION
-- 废弃/驳回/撤销数 SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK B ON A.ID_ = B.TASKID WHERE B.DEALUSER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND t.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) as DELEGATENUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE c.from_user = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS DELEGATENUM,-- 转办数
(SELECT COUNT(1) as DELEGATEDNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE c.TO_USER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS DELEGATEDNUM, -- 被转办数
(SELECT COUNT(1) as ENTRUSTNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE c.CREATE_USER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS ENTRUSTNUM, -- 委托数
(SELECT COUNT(1) as ENTRUSTEDNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE C.ENTRUST_USER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS ENTRUSTEDNUM -- 被委托数 FROM DUAL

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) AS REJECTNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE C.DEALTYPE = '1' AND C.DEALUSER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS REJECTNUM,-- 驳回数
( SELECT COUNT(1) AS CANCELNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE C.DEALTYPE = '2' AND C.DEALUSER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS CANCELNUM, -- 撤销数
(SELECT COUNT(1) AS DISCARDNUM FROM ACT_HI_PROCINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK C ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = C.PROCESS_ID WHERE C.DEALTYPE = '3' AND C.DEALUSER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end ) AS DISCARDNUM -- 废弃数 FROM DUAL

--废弃/撤销/驳回处理的流程 SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME_ AS PROCESSNAME, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK D ON A.ID_ = D.TASKID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE d.DEALUSER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end
union -- 转办处理的流程 SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME_ AS PROCESSNAME, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO D ON A.ID_ = D.TASKID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE D.FROM_USER = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end
union -- 委托处理的流程 SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME_ AS PROCESSNAME, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK D ON A.ID_ = D.TASKID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE D.Entrust_User = #[userName]
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end
union -- 自己任务处理的流程 SELECT DISTINCT C.NAME_ AS PROCESSNAME, B.BUSINESS_KEY_ AS BUSINESSKEY, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE A.ASSIGNEE_ = #[userName]
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK E WHERE A.ID_ = E.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO F WHERE A.ID_ = F.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK G WHERE A.ID_ = G.TASKID)
#if($count_start_time && !$count_start_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ >= #[count_start_time] #end
#if($count_end_time && !$count_end_time.equals("")) AND A.START_TIME_ <= #[count_end_time] #end

-- 废弃/撤销/驳回记录信息 SELECT A.NAME_ AS NODENAME, A.DURATION_NODE AS DURATIONNODE, A.DURATION_ AS DURATION, B.REMARK AS REMARK, A.START_TIME_ AS STARTTIME, A.END_TIME_ AS ENDTIME, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID, A.ALERTTIME AS ALERTTIME, A.OVERTIME AS OVERTIME FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_DEAL_TASK B ON A.ID_ = B.TASKID
WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND B.DEALUSER = ? AND A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
UNION -- 用户通过记录信息 SELECT A.NAME_ AS NODENAME, A.DURATION_NODE AS DURATIONNODE, A.DURATION_ AS DURATION, A.DELETE_REASON_ AS REMARK, A.START_TIME_ AS STARTTIME, A.END_TIME_ AS ENDTIME, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID, A.ALERTTIME AS ALERTTIME, A.OVERTIME AS OVERTIME FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A
WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND A.ASSIGNEE_ = ? AND A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK E WHERE A.ID_ = E.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO F WHERE A.ID_ = F.TASKID) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM TD_WF_DEAL_TASK G WHERE A.ID_ = G.TASKID)
UNION -- 用户转办记录信息 SELECT A.NAME_ AS NODENAME, A.DURATION_NODE AS DURATIONNODE, A.DURATION_ AS DURATION, A.DELETE_REASON_ AS REMARK, A.START_TIME_ AS STARTTIME, A.END_TIME_ AS ENDTIME, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID, A.ALERTTIME AS ALERTTIME, A.OVERTIME AS OVERTIME FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_NODE_CHANGEINFO D ON A.ID_ = D.TASKID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND D.FROM_USER = ? AND A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
UNION -- 用户委托记录信息 SELECT A.NAME_ AS NODENAME, A.DURATION_NODE AS DURATIONNODE, A.DURATION_ AS DURATION, A.DELETE_REASON_ AS REMARK, A.START_TIME_ AS STARTTIME, A.END_TIME_ AS ENDTIME, A.PROC_INST_ID_ AS PROCESSID, A.ALERTTIME AS ALERTTIME, A.OVERTIME AS OVERTIME FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST A RIGHT JOIN TD_WF_ENTRUST_TASK D ON A.ID_ = D.TASKID LEFT JOIN ACT_HI_PROCINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_ = B.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN ACT_RE_PROCDEF C ON A.PROC_DEF_ID_ = C.ID_ WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND D.ENTRUST_USER = ? AND A.PROC_INST_ID_ = ?
ORDER BY STARTTIME, PROCESSID
